com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPRadioButton

java.lang.Object
  RadioButton
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPRadioButton

public class WPRadioButton
extends RadioButton

In order to maintain compatibility with standard Android functionality WPRadioButton is very simple, it only implores a custom Drawable that is a solid color circle with another solid concentric circle when checked.

Version 1.01

  • Scaled by density.

Since:
16-03-2012
See Also:
